name: TAVFACE
description: TAVFACE brings social networking to the TAV Group of Companies, allowing us to communicate, collaborate, and build strong relationships with our colleagues. Whether you want to share important information, build a network of useful contacts, or follow people that interest you, share your innovative ideas with your collegues, there is an application for you inside TAVFACE.   Main features are: Status Updates: Share updates with your network Im Following: Vies status updates fom your network, people and communities you are following My Notifications: View updates or comment related to your content mentions: Status updates that your colleagues mentioned you. Action Required: Actions assigned to you Discover: All public status updates posted by everyone in TAVFACE News Story: Latest public status updates posted by everyone in TAVFACE Profiles: Find the people you need Communities: Work With people who share common roles and expertise Push Notifications: Offers the option to receive push notifications when new status update is available.
